title: Terms of Service
tagline: Read our terms of service to understand the rules and guidelines for using C to F Converter.
intro: Welcome to C to F Converter. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.

sections.title: 1. Use of Our Service
sections.content: You may use our service for personal, non-commercial purposes only. You agree not to:
list: Use our service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
Interfere with or disrupt the operation of our service
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of our service
Use automated means to access our service without our prior written consent
Modify, adapt, or hack our service or falsely imply any association with us

sections.title: 2. Intellectual Property
paragraphs: All content on our website, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of C to F Converter or its licensors and is protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, display, or create derivative works from any content on our website without our prior written consent.

sections.title: 3. User-Generated Content
paragraphs: If you submit any content to our website, you grant us a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to use, reproduce, modify, publish, and distribute such content in any manner.
You are solely responsible for any content you submit and agree that it does not violate any laws or the rights of third parties.

sections.title: 4. Disclaimer of Warranties
paragraphs: Our service is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We make no warranties, express or implied, regarding the accuracy, reliability, or availability of our service.
We do not warrant that our service will be uninterrupted or error-free, or that any defects will be corrected.

sections.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
paragraphs: In no event shall C to F Converter or its affiliates be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with your use of our service.
Our total liability to you for any claims arising out of or relating to these terms or our service shall not exceed the amount you paid to us, if any, for accessing our service.

sections.title: 6. Modifications to Service
paragraphs: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue our service at any time, with or without notice. We shall not be liable to you or any third party for any modification, suspension, or discontinuance of our service.

sections.title: 7. Changes to Terms
paragraphs: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new terms on this page. Your continued use of our service after any changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

sections.title: 8. Governing Law
paragraphs: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Country/State], without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

sections.title: 9. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
